name: GetDocumentStatsResult
documentation:
Response to a {@link io.fluxzero.common.api.search.GetDocumentStats} request.

Contains aggregated statistics for documents that matched a {@link SearchQuery}, grouped and computed in-memory. Statistics include common numeric metrics like count, min, max, sum, and average, organized per field and optional grouping.

For performance-sensitive use cases or large data sets, prefer {@link io.fluxzero.common.api.search.GetFacetStats}, which is computed by the backing store and generally faster. @see io.fluxzero.common.api.search.GetDocumentStats @see DocumentStats

fields.name: documentStats
fields.documentation: Aggregated statistics for matched document groups.

fields.name: requestId
fields.documentation: The unique identifier of the originating request.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.documentation: Timestamp when the statistics were computed.

methods.name: toMetric
methods.documentation: Returns a lightweight summary of this result for logging or metric tracking.
